name: Robert Walters
description:
Our story began in 1985, when our founder Robert Walters opened the first office in central London determined to build a reputation for being different, innovative and memorable. Since then, we have developed into a global business, and now operate in a diverse range of markets worldwide.
 For over 38 years, businesses across the globe have relied on us to find the very best specialist professionals and we are trusted to help build the careers of the world’s leading executives, job move after job move. It’s a success story we’re proud of and one that’s built on the strength and passion of our people.
features: 84% Proportion of non-UK net fee income
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Powering people and organisations to fulfil their unique potential
ShortDescription: Robert Walters is the world’s most trusted talent solutions business

Highlights.name: Engaging our workforce
Highlights.description: Led by our purpose, we’re creating a culture that engages, supports and empowers our employees to thrive.

Highlights.name: Enhancing our ED&I initiatives
Highlights.description: We see the power of diversity, enabling our clients, candidates and people to fulfil their unique potential.

Highlights.name: Our environmental impact
Highlights.description: We recognise the global threat posed by climate change, and we’re taking action to reduce our impact.

enhanced_description: Robert Walters, established in 1985, is a global talent solutions business headquartered in London, operating in diverse markets worldwide. For over 38 years, the company has specialized in helping businesses find specialist professionals and assisting leading executives with career progression. Beyond traditional recruitment services, Robert Walters also offers recruiting software and recruiting automation software, aimed at powering people and organizations to fulfill their unique potential and boost hiring manager confidence and productivity. The company demonstrates strong global reach, with 84% of its net fee income derived from non-UK sources, and a robust 10-year net fee income CAGR of 7% (ending 2023), reflecting its financial success and market presence.
competitive_advantages: Reputation for trust in talent solutions
Expertise in specialist professional and executive recruitment
